Was muss man zu Half Life noch sagen.
Man ist sofort im Spiel, steht ständig unter Strom und gleichzeitig auch nicht.
Keine andere Spielereihe schafft diesen Split derart perfekt. Mit wenigen Mitteln wird hier stilecht eine schöne Mission nach der nächsten abgeliefert. Überall gespickt mit kleinen Geheimnissen, erfindet man sich dank semi realistischer Physik als Bastler. Frei nach dem Motto "wer suchet, der findet"
Kein Spoiler:
Nach dem Hauptspiel geht es mit 2 offiziellen Addons und einer soliden Moddercommunity weiter.
Zu Episode 1 u. 2 kann man ebenfalls nur eines sagen:
Sie verzögern die Schmach, sobald der Epilog erscheint, wieder ein tolles Erlebnis zuende.
Abschließend, ein tolles Spiel, zeitlos, einsteigerfreundlich... ich könnte wieder und wieder von vorne anfangen und es macht immer wieder Laune.
Şu oyunun Fizik Motoru hala Bir çok oyunu tokatlar :)

Разработчики. Из-за вашей игры я не смог найти кнопку включения на компьютере, хотя это понятно вы пендосы зомбируете молодёжь своими лгбт играми. Почему я не могла ходить в вашей игре? Я что на дуру похожа, я прожила 2 мировую войну и знаю что украинцы сыновья гитлеровские и американцы прапогандируют молодёжную тупостью Ставлю класс потому что сын пенсию не украл.

full-life

forgot to review this one. really outstanding facial animations for its time, and the physics engine was fun to mess around with. i can only imagine what it was like to play in '04, because i was uh... you know. sort of a fetus with no arms. 
overall a really good game. ravenholm was terrifying, the g-man was as mysterious as ever, the shotgun was my faithful companion yet again, the dark matter point manipulator was an awesome final weapon, and the citadel was just imposing as hell once you sneak into it. 
the world of half-life is sort of depressing because of the aftermath of the resonance cascade. i mean, everyone is enslaved by a multiversal alien army with an iron fist, and all the sudden appearance of all the otherworldly creatures that invaded earth caused the extinction of countless animal species. the world governments are all completely gone, people are either enlisted and/or have their humanity and memories stripped, the countless billions of deaths caused by the seven hour war leaves millions of homes completely abandoned, leaving an eerie reminder of the beautiful world that used to be, and the inability to reproduce means every human on earth is part of the very last generation. we're forced to gather whatever is left of our home and fight against impossible odds. its a strangely heartfelt yet sad story.

honestly i wish i could erase my memories of this game to play it all over again. HEAVILY recommend.
2021 still a good game to play

nostaji

My favourite game. The environment really feels alive especially with the realistic gritty textures (although low res nowadays) and the 'soundscapes' which give specific areas a different collection of ambient sounds so it's definitely recommended to play this game with headphones. The interactable physics system (while being a little clunky sometimes) is so fun to play with, especially once you [spoiler]get the gravity gun[/spoiler]. I don't really know of any other non-source FPS games where you can use and abuse the physics like in this one. 

It is absolutely worth the price although I recommend buying it via the Orange Box package so you also get the two sequel episodes as well as Portal (another great source engine game).
masterpiece

Tak co Valve, kdy vyjde Half-Life 3?
Half-Life 2 bych se nebál označit za jednu z nejlepších počítačových her vůbec. Má skvělé ovládání, příběh, styl vyprávění, atmosféru, zapamatovatelné postavy a grafiku, která se oproti jiným hrám z toho roku stále drží. Doporučuji tedy všema deseti těm deseti lidem na planetě, kteří HL2 ještě nehráli. Nebojte se nasát ten pach popela, pane Freemane.
